This article assumes youalready know how to create a vector index and covers just the steps for addingvectorizers and field assignments.An indexer that drives the pipeline.） ImportantThis feature is in public preview under Supplemental Terms of Use.
The 2023-10-01-Preview REST API supports this feature.Prerequisites1. Use Create or Update Index (preview) to add a vectorizer.2. Add the following JSON to your index definition.
